nodes.text: The Botajef Defense Force was the planetary defense force of the Outer Rim world of Botajef. It was made up of seven squadrons of V-19 Torrent starfighters as well as two CR90 corvettes. It was mobilized against the forces of the Galactic Empire when Governor Quesl declared the planet's secession, however the rebellion was brought to an end after Commodore Thrawn revealed that the entire situation was merely a ruse to facilitate the theft of a collection of extremely valuable Jefi artwork and Quesl was taken into custody.
